item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

so up to now you have
added to models folder
added int to class8
andgone onto server and typed
add model
?if so

you now go into a file (dpepends on what source you use)
that for me has a lot of item id code under sub categories
like helmet
(item id.s to be worn on head)

if you can find that add the spear id into weapon…then your done mate

p.s
in your client go to client.java and search for add model
and pste here your add model command cause mine dont work
